title: Design Lead
description: Contributed to the student chapter by assisting with design-related activities and collaborating with team members.

title: Founder
description: Led the development of Bohon, focusing on understanding user needs, market research, and iterative problem-solving to improve the product.

title: Product Designer and Frontend Developer
description: Collaborated with the Fueler team on various projects, contributing to both design and frontend development aspects.

title: Lead Product Designer (Founding team)
description: Played a key role in shaping Foyer's design from its early stages, working closely with the founding team to establish and evolve the product's visual identity and user experience.
